name: Weapen And Armour Overhaul
description:
Completely overhauls the equipment in the game.

- Axes apply bleed and cripple
- Maces apply cripple and sunder
- Temperature effects are now dependent on the appearance of the armour
- Temperature stats are now only +/- 1, except for special items
- Non-epic equipment is removed, replaced with their epic counterparts
- Recipes have been completely overhauled, ingredients now depend on the visuals of the piece of equipment.
author: FifyTifty
